Chilli Chicken Wrap

The Chilli Chicken Wrap combines tender chicken pieces marinated in a spicy chilli sauce, wrapped up in a soft tortilla with fresh veggies. It's a quick and flavorful meal for those on the go.

schedule

 45

groups

 4

restaurant

 Pasta

nutrition

 655 cal

    Ingredient

  1. 2 boneless chicken breasts, thinly sliced
  2. 2 tbsp chilli sauce
  3. 1 tsp chilli powder
  4. 2 tbsp olive oil
  5. 4 large tortilla wraps
  6. 1/2 cup lettuce, shredded
  7. 1/2 cup red bell pepper, thinly sliced
  8. 1/2 cup grated cheese (optional)

    Marinate Chicken

  1. In a bowl, mix the sliced chicken, chilli sauce, chilli powder, and let it marinate for 20 minutes.

    2. Cook Chicken

  2. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook until it's fully cooked and slightly charred.

    3. Prepare Wrap

  3. Lay a tortilla flat, add lettuce, bell pepper, cooked chicken, and cheese (if using). Roll up tightly, securing with a toothpick if needed.

    4. Serve

  4. Cut the wrap in half diagonally and serve immediately. Enjoy!

Tip: For a spicier kick, add an extra dash of chilli sauce or use hot chilli powder.
